page.title: 15FAMILIES AND FOSTERING
page.content: My Mum and Dad foster difficult teenagers who have been led to behave as they do because they have not had a normal family pattern to follow. Very often I come home from school to see my Mum talking to yet another Social Worker. Then she would come in and say "Would you mind if we had another foster boy?" Then the child would come. I remember one boy, treated us like normal brothers and sisters. Another boy who is a punk and looks tough, really is nice. Sometimes we have a policeman coming round. One boy stole some objects and C.I.D. men came round to retrieve them. When I tell my Mum something and she tells me to go away, this makes me feel left out. I like to think that my Mum and Dad have love for children less fortunate than myself and my brothers.
